group.name: utility_entry
group.comment: Combat units favoured when playing defensively

group.name: utility_entry
group.comment: Give mongol horse units higher base utility so they are preferred over infantry

int.name: max_num
int.comment: For Sultanate, allow building more Monks for their Scholar research needs.

list.name: race_resource_filters
list.comment: These filter OUT any entities from resource gathering with these attributes for the provided race.

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Player Unit Combat Upgrade (exclude Sultanate civ.)

list.name: members
list.comment: These are specifically ebps because that's what they are build as. They transform into sbps on construction completion.

list.name: members
list.comment: Don't add mongol double production because that will mess up the count - when they are produced they cause 2 normal mongol scouts to spawn. This can be fix by using group counting on the population scorer, but for now we'll do it this way.

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Mongol horses get higher base util than other mongol units

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Don't score these. They are either unused in game or the AI cannot currently make use of them

float.name: base_scale
float.comment: This is below min score to produce so that these items will never be scored. They can still be requested.

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Player Unit Combat Upgrade (Sultanate civ only).

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Player Unit Combat Upgrade that all difficulties should make

template_reference.comment: Military related upgrades that do not upgrade a unit's performance

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Naval Military related upgrades that do not upgrade a unit's performance

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Player Naval Unit Combat Upgrade (exclude Sultanate civ.)

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Player Econ Production Upgrades that don't affect resource gather rates (exclude Sultanate civ.)

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Player Econ Production Upgrades that don't affect resource gather rates (Sultanate civ.)

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Sultanate Mosque - this uses a dummy function that always returns zero. Production is handled by the state tree sultanate_logic

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Wheelbarrow Upgrade. Separated from other economic upgrades to give it separate priority.

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Player Naval Unit Combat Upgrade (Sultanate civ. only)

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Dark Age Landmarks A (Dark Age landmarks are split into two groups to be randomly chosen)

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Dark Age Landmarks B (Dark Age landmarks are split into two groups to be randomly chosen)

float.name: base_scale
float.comment: lumber camp should score higher than anything else in the best case scenario.

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Production group for building capital in nomad mode

template_reference.name: production_group
template_reference.comment: Historic Abbasid: Atabeg from Trade Wing: Advisors
